descriptionHtml:
[size=5][size=6][size=5]Fire & Ice[/size][/size]

Hi there, what we have here is my take on fire and ice (winged version).

Comes with war axe and a battle axe and as always I hope it meets with your approval...Cheers :)

mrabubu has a youtube video and this is one of the featured mods..check it out :)
[/size][size=5][size=4]Thank you mrabubu[/size]
[/size][size=5]
[/size][size=5]https://youtu.be/rR4z2Rbfl5E
[/size]

[size=5][size=5]Craftable: Yes, at any forge under the steel category.
Tempered: Yes, at any smithy wheel.
Damage: About the same as daedric axe/battle axe

Screen shot: Armor used is [/size][/size][size=5][size=5]Vampire Rogue Armor by TheBlitz77 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61546/?[/size][/size]

[size=5]Installation:
Extract the contents(including folders) into your Skyrim game folder. Or use mod manager of choice.
[/size][size=4]Any questions and or comments are welcome. Thank you.

[color=#00ffff][size=5]Edit: Fixed issue with invisible war axe[/size][/color][/size]
author: tarll
